description: Kaya is a girl from Ashitaka`s vilage. She loves Ashitaka and is the only person to see him off after he is banished from his tribe. Her parting gift to Ashitaka is a dagger which should protect him from any dangers to come. The dagger is also a symbol of betrothing in the village and is supposed to show that Kaya is determined to marry Ashitaka in the future.
name: Kaya
